email.invalidFormat.translation: Email domain must be in valid format

error.create.password.translation: Invalid Password. Please try using a more secure password.

error.create.processing.translation: There was an error processing your request: {errorMsg}

error.create.userExists.translation: The username {username} is already taken. Please try a different one.

input.lessOrEqual.translation: {content} must be less than or equal to {characterCount} characters long

input.maxLength.translation: {content, select, undefined{Must} other {{content} must} } be less than {characterCount} characters long

input.minLength.translation: {content} must be at least {characterCount} characters long

password.allowedSpecialChars.translation:
Special characters can be any of the following:
<0>@ $ ! % * # ? &

password.charRestrictions.translation: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one numeric digit, and one special character.

phone.mustBeAValidNumber.translation: Must be a valid phone number

username.exists.translation: This username already exists. Please choose another one.

username.symbolRestriction.translation: Username must not include these special character: %
